newsitem.title: SWEDEN: S-E-Banken and OM to cooperate on admin.
newsitem.headline: S-E-Banken and OM to cooperate on admin.

text.p: Swedish commercial bank S-E-Banken said on Thursday its custody service unit was to cooperate with Swedish clearing and brokerage house OM on administrative handling of securities papers.
Under the agreement OM subsidiary VPA (Vardepappersadministration) will handle parts of the custody activities for S-E-Banken, the bank said in a statement.

"According to the agreement VPA will take over production responsibility in the second quarter of 1997, by which time the firm's back office system will meet the custody service's requirements," S-E-Banken said.
The bank said that the agreement would increase cost effectiveness and scope for improved service and products in the custody service.
